item.title: Aaargh! what's the prblem with this code?
item.dc:creator: @spleen15 spleen15
item.description:
@spleen15 wrote:

case 2091://copper rock if(playerLevel[14] >= 0) { if (hasPick()) { if(actionTimer == 0) { addItem(436, 1); actionTimer = 25; addSkillXP((4*playerLevel[14]), 14); setAnimation(625); } } else if(playerLevel[14] <= 0) { sendMessage("You need a thieving level of 80 to steal from here."); } else if (!hasPick()) { sendMessage("Try equpping a bronze pickaxe before mining."); } } break;
